annihilation.name: Annihilation
annihilation.rules: Center a cloud effect template on the model directly hit. The template is a hazard and remains in play as long as upkeep is paid. While in the template, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.

admonition.name: Admonition
admonition.rules: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is placed within 6" of target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

avengingForce.name: Avenging Force
avengingForce.rules: If one or more friendly Faction warrior models were damaged by enemy attacks while in the spellcaster's control range during your opponent's last turn, during your Maintenance Phase one model in the spellcaster's battlegroup in its control range can advance 3" and make one basic attack.

breathStealer.name: Breath Stealer
breathStealer.rules: Target model/unit suffers -2 SPD and DEF for one round.

calamity.name: Calamity
calamity.rules: Target enemy models/units suffers -2 DEF and ARM.

carrionFeast.name: Carrion Feast
carrionFeast.rules: Center a cloud effect template on the model directly hit. The template is a hazard and remains in play as long as upkeep is paid. While in the template, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.

crusadersCall.name: Crusader's Call
crusadersCall.rules: Friendly Faction models beginning a charge in the spellcaster's control range gain +2 SPD. Crusader's Call lasts for one turn.

cursedFate.name: Cursed Fate
cursedFate.rules: Target model/unit suffers -2 DEF. When a damage roll resulting from a direct hit fails to exceed the ARM of an affected model, the model suffers 1 damage point. Cursed Fate lasts for one turn.

curseOfShadows.name: Curse of Shadows
curseOfShadows.rules: Target model/unit suffers -2 ARM. A model can advance through an affected model if it has enough movement to move completely past its base.

deceleration.name: Deceleration
deceleration.rules: While in the spellcaster's control range, friendly Faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and arcane attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

energizer.name: Energizer
energizer.rules: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is currently in its control range can immediatly advance up to 2". Energizer can be cast only once per activation.

escort.name: Escort
escort.rules: Cohort models in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in the spellcaster's control range gain +2 SPD when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more cohort models in its battlegroup are within 3" of it.

heightenedReflexes.name: Heightened Reflexes
heightenedReflexes.rules: Target friendly model can not be knocked down or made stationary for one round.

impendingDoom.name: Impending Doom
impendingDoom.rules: Enemy models within 5" of the spellcaster are pushed 5" directly toward it in the order you choose.

inhospitableGround.name: Inhospitable Ground
inhospitableGround.rules: While in the spellcaster's control range, enemy models treat open terrain as rough terrain. Inhospitable Ground lasts for one round.

jackhammer.name: Jackhammer
jackhammer.rules: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its control range immediately makes one basic melee attack.

mobility.name: Mobility
mobility.rules: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its control range gain +2 SPD and {pathfinder} for one turn.

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.rules: The spellcaster and friendly Faction models beginning their activations in its control range gain {ability:relentlessCharge} for one turn.

openFire.name: Open Fire
openFire.rules: Target {cohort} model in this model's battlegroup that is in its control range can immediately make one basic range attack. A model can be targeted by Open Fire only once per turn.

positiveCharge.name: Positive Charge
positiveCharge.rules: Target friendly Faction {cohort} model gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected {cohort} model, other friendly Faction models gain +2 on melee attack and melee damage rolls. Positive Charge lasts for one turn.

redline.name: Redline
redline.rules: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 SPD and can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus. Additionally, the affected model gains +2 to its melee attack damage rolls and collateral damage rolls. At the end of each of its activations, the affected warjack suffers d3 damage points.

rhythmOfWar.name: Rhythm of War
rhythmOfWar.rules: Warjacks in this model's battlegroup that are in its control range can advance up to 3" after all friendly models have ended their activations on your turn.

shadowmancer.name: Shadowmancer
shadowmancer.rules: While in the spellcaster's control range, models in its battlegroup gain Stealth and Dark Shroud. Shadowmancer lasts for one round.

shadowStep.name: Shadow Step
shadowStep.rules: Enemy models currently within 2" of the spellcaster suffer {ability:shadowBind} for one round. Additionally, you can place the spellcaster anywhere completely within 3" of its current location. Shadow Step can be cast only once per activation.

Sunhammer.name: Sunhammer
Sunhammer.rules: Enemy warbeasts and warjacks that advance more than 1" and end their Normal Movement in the spellcaster's control range suffer d3 damage points.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.rules: Place the spellcaster anywhere completely within 6" of its current location, then its activation ends.

veilOfMists.name: Veil of Mists
veilOfMists.rules: Place a {cloudEffect} template anywhere completely within the spellcaster's control range. The template does not block friendly Faction models's LOS. While in the template, friendly Faction models gain {pathfinder} and can move through obstructions and other models if they have enough movement to move completely past them.
